titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation requiring all such as have any office or command in Ireland, to make their speedy repaire thither to attend their imployment.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms at head of text.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, this 17th of March, in the twentieth yeare of Our Raigne, 1644.
Imperfect: creased with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
